name: Stephanie
description: a young woman who stares into the distance.

57: "But I sense none with you are dead."
. Take care." Her long lashes flitter a moment.
"I don't think I'm the one to ask that of."
566: "Come to my shop when I'm open!"
After touching your brow she states, "You feel fine to me."
841: She feels each brow and holds her ear close to your mouths.
"Will you make an offering of 25 gold?"
She closes her eyes, puts a delicate hand on your brow and chants softly.
"I cannot heal you if you won't tithe."
1351: "I'm sorry. Without an offering I cannot heal you."
"I sense your hesitation is based on your empty pockets."
"I also sense your cause is a just one."
She closes her eyes, puts a delicate hand on your brow and chants softly.
1625: Her blue eyes pierce you. "What else can I do for you?"
1688: "Come to my shop when I'm open!"
She lifts your hand against her lips. "You are not poisoned."
1965: Holding each hand against her lips she states "You are not poisoned."
2179: "Will you make an offering of 5 gold?"
Placing your hand over her heart, she closes her eyes and whispers something.
"Without the offering I cannot cure you."
2480: "I'm sorry. Without an offering I cannot cure you."
A tear comes to her eyes.
"I should have known you would not ask unless 		[you were in grave need."
"Come, put your hand on my heart."
Placing your hand over her heart, she closes her eyes and whispers something.
2802: "I sense that someone has met a terrible fate."
2856: "Come to my shop when I'm open!"
"Will you make an offering of 350 gold?"
"Then there is nothing I can do save grieve with you."
3034: "I'm sorry, all I can do is grieve with you."
Your party takes up a collection for their fallen comrade.
3385: "I sense that others have been lost as well..."
